pullrequest.title: Eliminate potential deadlock from SIGCHLD signal handler

content.raw: Okay, I don't see how we can use semaphores either because `sem_wait` is not safe in a signal handler. Is there a reason why the master process needs to load plugins instead of doing it in a new process? If we do it in a new process, the master process will just monitor the other processes and we won't need the worker thread. It'll be single-threaded, which'll make it possible to block `SIGCHILD`.
